WorkItem.ClosedComment: This was already the case, but has now also been reflected in the CodePlex repository.Stable PHPExcel PEAR packages can now also be found at www.pearplex.com.
WorkItem.Description:
I will suggest that the repository follows the standard svn directory layout structure with the following directories.
 
trunk
tags
branches
 
The code goes into trunk. When a release is made it is tagged with x.x.x from the svn client and that will automatically be put into tags.
 
Following these conventions will make it possible to do automatic releases of pear packages through pearhub.org.
WorkItem.Summary: Follow the standard svn directory layout
